name: AssessPrep
description: AssessPrep is an advanced assessment platform designed for K-12 schools to make assessments efficient and improve learning outcomes. AssessPrep can be used for low-stakes, online formative assessments or high-stakes, offline and secure summative assessments for multiple curricula - IB, Pearson, Cambridge, CBSE and National Curriculum. Our educator community of 100+ schools in 25 countries, is growing fast and creating record resources and assessments to make full use of AssessPrep and gather half a million responses from students every month. Ideal for remote assessments and online assessments in times of school closures.

As part of our Bangalore School Visits Campaign, Karan Gupta, Co-Founder of AssessPrep, and Karn Ragade from the Curriculum Team had the privilege of visiting Good Shepherd International School.
We conducted an interactive Teacher Training Session, focusing on how to create, deliver, monitor, and grade assessments to prepare students for the IBMYP and IBDP final assessments. We also shared insights into the role of AI in grading, showcasing how cutting-edge technology is transforming the way assessments are evaluated. 🚀
We’re especially excited that the school uses AssessPrep across multiple curricula, including MYP, IGCSE, and ICSE! It was inspiring to see the school’s commitment to innovation in education.
A big thanks to Mrs. Indu Susan Thomas & Mr. Suresh Thangarajan for their warm welcome and support, and to the dedicated teachers for their enthusiastic participation—we’re excited to continue supporting their journey to excellence! 🙌
#assessprep #innovation #workshop #teachers #training

Thrilled to share highlights from our recent visit to Sharanya Narayani International School in Bangalore! 🏫✨
What started as a simple training session with the teachers quickly evolved into an engaging dialogue about our shared vision for education. The energy and enthusiasm from the teachers were truly inspiring—it reminded us why we do what we do!
During the session, Karan Gupta (Co-Founder) and Karn Ragade (Director of Curriculum) demonstrated how AssessPrep streamlines the assessment cycle—from creation to analysis—helping teachers save valuable time & increase their productivity. 
We were thrilled to introduce our new AssessPrep AI features and our IB DP question bank, and it was incredible to see the excitement from the teachers. The thoughtful feedback and insightful discussions with the teachers will undoubtedly help shape the future of AssessPrep.
A special thank you to Mr. Thavamani (Head of Academics), Mrs. Deepthi C.K (DP Coordinator), and Ms. Kalyani G(MYP Coordinator) for their warm hospitality and invaluable insights.
Thank you, Sharanya Narayani International School, for being a beacon of educational excellence and for partnering with us on this journey! We look forward to more collaborations in the future.


#EducationInnovation #AssessPrep #IBSchools #SharanyaNarayaniInternationalSchool

Assessments 𝘧𝘰𝘳 learning empower students to engage deeply, think critically, and showcase their unique talents. Let’s transform assessments into inspiring journeys that fuel a lifelong love of learning.

A huge thank you to everyone who joined today’s webinar on “𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗘𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗽𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗜𝗕-𝗗𝗣”🙏

Today, we explored the IB’s phased transition to digital exams (starting May 2026) and discussed the challenges schools face moving away from traditional pen-and-paper methods – insights drawn from our survey of 100+ schools.

Key Takeaways on 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗽 𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗦𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗼𝗹:

✅𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝘂𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝘁𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆-𝗱𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻 𝗳𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲: Digital assessments are interactive and can include videos, audio, and graphics that make learning come alive and helps assess students of today, better.

✅𝗡𝗮𝘃𝗶𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝗵𝗶𝗳𝘁: As the IB DP goes digital, AssessPrep provides the tools to manage this transition smoothly and effectively.

✅𝗔𝗜-𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝘆: Save significant time with AI-assisted question authoring (aligned with IB DP) and AI-powered grading, freeing up educators to focus on teaching.

✅𝗨𝗻𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱 𝗙𝗹𝗲𝘅𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: Deliver assessments securely online (browser/lockdown) or keep familiar paper workflows with our revolutionary Paper Mode.

✅𝗣𝗮𝗽𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗶𝗰: AssessPrep's standout features such as the Paper Mode will help schools transition to digital assessments at their own speed. Automate test creation, grading, and gain deep analytics even for handwritten assessments – bridging the gap between paper and digital perfectly.

✅𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗗𝗣 𝗤𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗟𝗶𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗿𝘆: Leverage our extensive DP Question Bank (15,000+ questions, 18 subjects) for high-quality assessment creation.

✅𝗔𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀: Go beyond surface-level data with comprehensive analytics to truly understand student performance.

A huge thank you to everyone who joined today’s webinar on “𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗘𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗽𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗜𝗕-𝗗𝗣”🙏

Today, we explored the IB’s phased transition to digital exams (starting May 2026) and discussed the challenges schools face moving away from traditional pen-and-paper methods – insights drawn from our survey of 100+ schools.

Key Takeaways on 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗽 𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗦𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗼𝗹:

✅𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝘂𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝘁𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆-𝗱𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻 𝗳𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲: Digital assessments are interactive and can include videos, audio, and graphics that make learning come alive and helps assess students of today, better.

✅𝗡𝗮𝘃𝗶𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝗵𝗶𝗳𝘁: As the IB DP goes digital, AssessPrep provides the tools to manage this transition smoothly and effectively.

✅𝗔𝗜-𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝘆: Save significant time with AI-assisted question authoring (aligned with IB DP) and AI-powered grading, freeing up educators to focus on teaching.

✅𝗨𝗻𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱 𝗙𝗹𝗲𝘅𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: Deliver assessments securely online (browser/lockdown) or keep familiar paper workflows with our revolutionary Paper Mode.

✅𝗣𝗮𝗽𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗶𝗰: AssessPrep's standout features such as the Paper Mode will help schools transition to digital assessments at their own speed. Automate test creation, grading, and gain deep analytics even for handwritten assessments – bridging the gap between paper and digital perfectly.

✅𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗗𝗣 𝗤𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗟𝗶𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗿𝘆: Leverage our extensive DP Question Bank (15,000+ questions, 18 subjects) for high-quality assessment creation.

✅𝗔𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀: Go beyond surface-level data with comprehensive analytics to truly understand student performance.

Our Vision: We’re here to support your school’s unique assessment journey, helping you transition at your own pace while harnessing the power of AI and digital tools

From June 2026, students will begin sitting digital exams in Biology and Maths. By 2033, 85% of subjects are expected to be available in digital format. 

This shift reflects the way today’s students live and learn — in digital environments. It allows for richer assessments, greater inclusion, faster marking, and clearer data for teachers.

How schools can prepare for the shift:

📘 Review digital infrastructure and technical readiness
📘 Provide regular digital mock exams to build student confidence
📘 Begin digitising internal assessments
📘 Support teachers in adapting to digital assessment formats

Explore what this means for your school here 👇https://hubs.ly/Q03sQsh40

Impact in Action: A School Story

For our students, every assessment is AssessPrep! 
– Saba Husain, MYP Coordinator, Stonehill International School

Stonehill International School envisioned a seamless MYP eAssessment process for their students and educators. They aimed to provide an authentic IB exam experience while also freeing up valuable teacher time through smarter solutions.What did Stonehill do?

✅ Deployed AssessPrep to precisely simulate the IB MYP eAssessment environment.

✅Empowered teachers with AssessPrep to seamlessly integrate rich multimedia into exams.

✅Expanded AssessPrep school-wide, from Grade 6, making students exam-day confident.What did the school achieve?

✅Slashed teacher time by 50% with AssessPrep's ManageBac+ grade synchronization.

✅Skyrocketed student confidence for official eAssessments through familiar practice on AssessPrep.

✅Cultivated such rapid student adoption of AssessPrep, they even began teaching their teachers!

We're thrilled to see Stonehill International School making such a significant impact on student preparedness and teacher efficiency.

A huge thank you to everyone who joined today’s webinar on “𝗧𝗵𝗲 𝗘𝘃𝗼𝗹𝘃𝗶𝗻𝗴 𝗟𝗮𝗻𝗱𝘀𝗰𝗮𝗽𝗲 𝗼𝗳 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗺𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗜𝗕-𝗗𝗣”🙏

Today, we explored the IB’s phased transition to digital exams (starting May 2026) and discussed the challenges schools face moving away from traditional pen-and-paper methods – insights drawn from our survey of 100+ schools.

Key Takeaways on 𝗛𝗼𝘄 𝗔𝘀𝘀𝗲𝘀𝘀𝗣𝗿𝗲𝗽 𝗘𝗺𝗽𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝘀 𝗬𝗼𝘂𝗿 𝗦𝗰𝗵𝗼𝗼𝗹:

✅𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝘁𝗼𝗼𝗹𝘀 𝗽𝗿𝗲𝗽𝗮𝗿𝗲 𝘀𝘁𝘂𝗱𝗲𝗻𝘁𝘀 𝗳𝗼𝗿 𝗮 𝘁𝗲𝗰𝗵𝗻𝗼𝗹𝗼𝗴𝘆-𝗱𝗿𝗶𝘃𝗲𝗻 𝗳𝘂𝘁𝘂𝗿𝗲: Digital assessments are interactive and can include videos, audio, and graphics that make learning come alive and helps assess students of today, better.

✅𝗡𝗮𝘃𝗶𝗴𝗮𝘁𝗲 𝘁𝗵𝗲 𝗗𝗶𝗴𝗶𝘁𝗮𝗹 𝗦𝗵𝗶𝗳𝘁: As the IB DP goes digital, AssessPrep provides the tools to manage this transition smoothly and effectively.

✅𝗔𝗜-𝗣𝗼𝘄𝗲𝗿𝗲𝗱 𝗘𝗳𝗳𝗶𝗰𝗶𝗲𝗻𝗰𝘆: Save significant time with AI-assisted question authoring (aligned with IB DP) and AI-powered grading, freeing up educators to focus on teaching.

✅𝗨𝗻𝗺𝗮𝘁𝗰𝗵𝗲𝗱 𝗙𝗹𝗲𝘅𝗶𝗯𝗶𝗹𝗶𝘁𝘆: Deliver assessments securely online (browser/lockdown) or keep familiar paper workflows with our revolutionary Paper Mode.

✅𝗣𝗮𝗽𝗲𝗿 𝗠𝗼𝗱𝗲 𝗠𝗮𝗴𝗶𝗰: AssessPrep's standout features such as the Paper Mode will help schools transition to digital assessments at their own speed. Automate test creation, grading, and gain deep analytics even for handwritten assessments – bridging the gap between paper and digital perfectly.

✅𝗘𝘅𝘁𝗲𝗻𝘀𝗶𝘃𝗲 𝗗𝗣 𝗤𝘂𝗲𝘀𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻 𝗟𝗶𝗯𝗿𝗮𝗿𝘆: Leverage our extensive DP Question Bank (15,000+ questions, 18 subjects) for high-quality assessment creation.

✅𝗔𝗰𝘁𝗶𝗼𝗻𝗮𝗯𝗹𝗲 𝗜𝗻𝘀𝗶𝗴𝗵𝘁𝘀: Go beyond surface-level data with comprehensive analytics to truly understand student performance.

Our Vision: We’re here to support your school’s unique assessment journey, helping you transition at your own pace while harnessing the power of AI and digital tools

Ready to see it in action? Book a demo:  https://lnkd.in/e-Hdum6K
